issue.message: The locale folder "`he`" should be called "`iw`" instead; see the `java.util.Locale` documentation
Call requires API level 26 (current min is 23): `java.time.LocalDate#now`
Call requires API level 26 (current min is 23): `java.time.LocalDate#withDayOfMonth`
Call requires API level 26 (current min is 23): `java.time.LocalDateTime#toLocalTime`
Field requires API level 26 (current min is 23): `java.time.LocalTime#MIDNIGHT`
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
